ygData.subject: Re: RE
ygData.msgSnippet: Mostly I am a lurker on this list...10th Dwarves Warrior, Ironore on Eci i Got to agree with a previous poster about the huge amounts of mail that come in on
ygData.messageBody:
Mostly I am a lurker on this list...10th Dwarves Warrior, Ironore on Eci'i

Got to agree with a previous poster about the huge amounts of mail that come
in on this list, it gets a bit much. And the digest mode is just about
useless, as everyone who RE:'s keeps including the full text from the
previous poster, resulting in literally 100's of lines of text per email.
Is it really necessary to include the full body of the 10 previous responses
to a post in an post that doesn't even address the subject anymore?


Sorry for the criticism, I do get a lot out of this list and hope to be able
to contribute to it as I level up.

BTW I have a Bard friend who has his Alcohol Tolerance up to 50ish. He can
no longer get drunk :( and to make things worse as AT goes up you not only
stop getting stupid, but you loose the buff as well. So all effects of
Alcohol are mitigated.

Ironore
